Cedar mill at Eureka Mine



We headed into the Panamints to escape the heat, and stopped here for lunch.
Taken Tuesday, March 30, 2004, 12:57:15pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 7.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/320s @ F8.0, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 78mm (125mm equiv)
